question: I’m receiving an error message when typing in my email address.  What do I do now?
text:
Im receiving an error message when typing in my email address.  What do I do now?
          
        
If you are receiving an error message when setting up your account, it may be because you have a hyphen in your email address.
To Fix: Use an alternate email account that does not include a hyphen or create a new email account that does not include a hyphen. Once this email account is established, return to the Account Set-up page and use the new email address as your login for your Pennie Account.
